name: unpressured
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not feeling or making someone feel pressure (= a strong influence) to do something: You can browse the store in a relaxed, unpressured atmosphere. They were all unpressured, voluntary participants. Synonym
unpressurized
More examplesFewer examplesI'd like a job that's unpressured and that will fit in around us having kids.It is important that they are given a fair opportunity to reach an unpressured decision.The simulation allows students to gain confidence with clinical techniques in a safe and unpressured academic environment before clinical placement.
